title: Draft Pick in Normals? Was it an error?

replies.body: I want this so bad... Does NA have it?? If so im gonna transfer across. Id rather deal with the ping to have draft normal
We will never be seen as a real region, not here or anywhere. We can only keep at it until they at least try to give us something decent.

I've seen several Rioter comments that "they hear us" on Draft Normals and Dominion, but I've seen neither hide nor hair of both. Draft Normals, despite getting plenty of support, hasn't been released yet and Dominion got **_permanently discontinued before it was even released here._**

I loved playing Diminion back in the day on NA, I'm at least glad I got the icon for it. But it is very sad, we have enough players asking for something, yet they won't offer it.

It is a double edged blade, with the low player base you can either not treat us like everyone else or take the risk, there is only 2 things that will happen, and I think they fear the later.

First it can better the game, get more player joining and more playing. Second is that with the extra queues there will be less people in each and you know what goes with that.

But like Dominion, and soon to be TT, Riot will simply do nothing and let it fall apart to the point it can't be saved. Dominion was never looked at since all ranked and tournaments go through conquest, so they balance everything there, and I mean everything. The least they could have done is change how Dominion works to stop those dodgy tactics, it could have been done, there were viable ideas.

Same goes for TT, players are either choosing whoever and sucking ass, or they are choosing assassins who have escapes and some form of CC, thus allowing them to simply wait and get an easy kill or run away and not die. There is no more team work in that queue, no more choosing someone like Garen, or Yi or Malz, it just no longer works.

If they don't do something about TT, that will go next. And it is the same with Draft Normals and low level Ranked. They need to fix them or they will become unviable and everything will just fall apart.
